title: headed straight for the castle

title: Dark Origins
author: Indee
summary: Squips are a mystery. Their presence online is next-to-nothing, they can only be purchased in shady places like the back of a Payless Shoes, and even their real origins are unknown.Jeremy Heere was fine, perfectly fine, not knowing where Squips came from. He was content with his being gone and that being the end of the story. Except it isn't, and Jeremy is about to find out the very dark origins of a certain supposed-to-be dead supercomputer.(Update schedule is currently up in the air, may update every week eventually.)

title: Meant to Break the Laws of Gravity Too
author: BetsyByron

series.s_title: We Were Meant to Make a Thing or Two

summary: Do you ever feel like you want to read Harry Potter for the first time again? This fic‚Äôs for you!What if losing someone added something to your life instead? What could Harry‚Äôs childhood have been like if Vernon Dursley hadn‚Äôt been in it? How could Draco‚Äôs have turned up if he hadn‚Äôt grown up in Lucius Malfoy‚Äôs shadow?Canon-divergent rewrite of the books, based on how the absence of these two minor, but nevertheless key characters would change things, with OTPs and other liberties taken.

title: Young & Beautiful
author: Velvetoscar
summary: Louis, to his horror, attends an elitist university in which the name Zayn Malik means something, Niall Horan doesn't stop talking, there are pianos everywhere, and Harry Styles, only son of a drug-addled, clinically insane ex-rocker, has a perfect smile and empty eyes.

title: I Am Damaged
author: Raging_Celiac
summary: Jeremy Heere is trying to put the events of his junior year behind him when his father's company moves to Sherwood, Ohio and he's forced to move away from his only friend, Michael Mell. Through his haze of angst, the one positive Jeremy can find is that there's no-one at this school who could know what he pulled back at Middleborough, so he won't be treated as badly, he hopes. I can deal with the bullies, he tells himself. Of course, things go awry when he manages to simultaneously gain the interest of the local emo kid and his new school's demon queen in his first week. The series of events that unfolds next is as improbable to Jeremy as it is shocking, but hey - since when was life not a complicated mess?

title: After Hours
author: OhCaptainMyCaptain
summary: Steve wishes Bucky wouldn‚Äôt look at him the way he does ‚Äì a deliberate gaze, subtly digging his top teeth into that pouty bottom lip; following his every move like a lion watches a gazelle. It‚Äôs been going on for months, perhaps longer... Steve talks, and Bucky listens. Well, that‚Äôs the point ‚Äì Bucky‚Äôs supposed to be listening. Steve‚Äôs just doing his job, after all‚Ä¶ No harm in that.The problem is that it‚Äôs no innocent gesture, the way Bucky will have the top of his pen tracing the outline of his mouth... It‚Äôs also not innocent at all when Steve turns to look out at the sea of heads while he‚Äôs speaking and catches the quickest glimpse of the brunet sneaking a peek at his ass. And Bucky doesn‚Äôt even pretend to be bashful about it. He just meets Steve‚Äôs eyes and smirks ‚Äì just the tiniest hint of a thing.Even bigger a problem than all that is how absolutely wrong it is. There are a million and one reasons why Bucky‚Äôs behavior is inappropriate, and why the way it makesStevefeel is even more inappropriate.For starters, Steve is Bucky‚Äôs teacher.Secondly, he‚Äôs only seventeen.

title: The Electric Fizzing Prick Pistols, or Whatever
author: whitmans_kiss

James finds his, Sirius had everything figured out back in First Year, Peter doesn‚Äôt talk to girls anyway, and Remus thinks he‚Äôd very much just like to put his earmuffs back on and disappear.(Written August, 2013.)

title: Sooner or Later You're Gonna be Mine
author: Staringback
summary: Frisk sang for a living.  She sang in clubs that were populated by mobsters, murderers and the most violent criminals her city had to offer.  She honestly thought things couldn't get any worse until corruption in the form of a grinning skeleton came strolling into her life.  His name:  Sans.She tried to run, but no matter where she went he was always waiting for her.¬†Chapter 34 finally up!

title: survival is a talent
author: ShanaStoryteller
summary: In the middle of their second year, Draco and Harry discover they're soulmates and do their best to keep it a secret from everyone.Their best isn't perfect.~‚ÄúAre you trying to get killed, Potter?‚Äù Malfoy drawls, stalking forward. Quick as a serpent himself, he reaches out and grabs the snake just below the head. It thrashes in his grip, but is no longer able to bite anyone. ‚ÄúThis is a poisonous snake, and I doubt anyone brought a bezoar with them.‚ÄùHarry glares. He opens his mouth, and feels the beginning the snake‚Äôs language pass his lips, and this isn‚Äôt what he wants, what‚Äôs the point of insulting Malfoy if he can‚Äôt understand him ‚ÄìMalfoy‚Äôs eyes widen. He slaps his hand over Harry‚Äôs mouth, ‚ÄúPotter, what the hell‚Äì‚Äù~(Now with aTV Tropes page!)

title: A Study in Love
author: bumbleholmes
summary: A couple months ago, I was asked to write a research paper for one of my final grades in my last English course of public school. We were asked to choose a Victorian-era English novel; my teacher gave us a list, but naturally, I asked specifically for something else.As the tags say, 'A Study in Love' delves deep into the original homo-romantic subtext, queer history references and ties, and true love demonstrated within ACD's classic tales. This is their story.

title: Selfless
author: Castiell
summary: ‚ÄúWhat I‚Äôm wondering is...How can you know? How can you know you‚Äôre into guys if you‚Äôve never been with one?‚ÄùHis dad‚Äôs face wasn‚Äôt mean spirited, he wasn‚Äôt trying to mock Jake‚Äôs words and yet Jake was completely thrown off guard. Panic tightened his throat as he struggled to find a way to articulate an answer. A voice that sounded very similar to Angelina Jolie hissed, What if he‚Äôs right? What if you‚Äôre just making things up again for attention? The words echoed the same ones he had overheard the doctor say to his parents after they conducted a mental exam and everything had turned out to be fine.No, no. The Squip had been real and he wasn‚Äôt lying about his sexuality. So how could he convince his dad, who was expectantly waiting for an answer Jake didn‚Äôt have?Jake‚Äôs usual smooth words and manner were infuriatingly absent. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not a-a test trial. I do know I‚Äôm in-into guys because-because-‚Äù‚ÄúBecause what, Jake?‚Äù‚ÄúBecause I‚Äôm in a relationship with one!‚Äù He blurted out, much to the surprise of both himself and his dad....‚ÄúHis name is uh-‚Äù Jake‚Äôs gaze darted around frantically, landing on a sole figure standing off to the side ‚Äú-Michael! His name is Michael Mell.‚Äù

One quick twist of the neck is all it will take, but the Soldier finds he cannot do it.So instead of killing Tony Stark, the Winter Soldier takes him away to raise as his own.

title: The Twice-Told Tale
author: arysteia
summary: For someone he'd hero-worshipped for so long, Steve Rogers in the flesh is a pretty big disappointment.  For one thing, he keeps looking at Tony as though he reminds him of someone else, and even if he never says anything, Tony's pretty sure it's his father.  A lifetime of not measuring up to Howard's expectations is more than enough, thank you very much, and he's certainly not going to make an effort to live up to any of Steve's.  Steve's pretty clearly failed to live up tohisexpectations, in any case, and that's not hypocritical atall.

title: So no sorrow, no (I cannot wait to see you)
author: PersonyPepper
summary: The bard unclasps the pouch, a vial of moisturizer (scented far too strongly, he doesn‚Äôt use it around Geralt anymore), two brushes, a small jar of rouge, and another of kan-mai glint in the sun and oh Melitele, Jaskier feels like a very, very naughty boy as he opens the jar of rouge.Geralt doesn‚Äôt fucking twitch as Jaskier drags the the brush over his slightly chapped lips, his strokes fluid motions as he paints his witcher‚Äôs lips red. He‚Äôs careful to not miss a spot and not to make a mess of it, either as he goes over parted (slightly slobbery) lips. He dabs the rouge onto Geralt‚Äôs cheekbones, just a hint of a shy blush before he sits back on his knees, entirely satisfied.Fuckhim, Geralt looks petty.
